remarks: The coefficients of the fourier series are integrable and reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem22.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
fourierdlem22.c $e |- C = ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) $.
fourierdlem22.fibl $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` C ) e. L^1 ) $.
fourierdlem22.a $e |- A = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem22.b $e |- B = ( n e. NN |-> ( S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem22 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( n e. NN0 -> ( A ` n ) e. RR ) /\ ( n e. NN -> ( B ` n ) e. RR ) ) ) $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d n ph x $.
$d n x $.
